title: 138. Whatever Happened to the Carpal Tunnel Epidemic?
description: Once upon a time, office workers across America lived in fear of a dreaded infirmity. Was the computer keyboard really the villain -- and did carpal tunnel syndrome really go away?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: Once upon a time, office workers across America lived in fear of a dreaded infirmity. Was the computer keyboard really the villain -- and did carpal tunnel syndrome really go away?
